title: Jamboree for friendship
brief_description: Boy Scouts from one hundred countries take part in the varied activities at the Twelfth Boy Scout Jamboree in Idaho, summer 1967. Youths swap talk and ideas, show each other crafts, national dances and customs, attend religious services, take part in a rodeo and a spectacular night campfire - making friends from around the world.
